description: Disaster dropping from heaven. Unexpected calamity.

examples.chinese: 真是天降横祸,倒霉透顶
examples.translation: Truly an unexpected disaster, extremely unlucky

examples.chinese: 天降横祸！开车时被飞来轮胎砸中身亡
examples.translation: Disaster from the sky! Killed by a flying tire while driving

examples.chinese: 天降横祸！发生7级地震造成重大人员伤亡
examples.translation: Disaster from the sky! M7 earthquake caused heavy casualties

examples.chinese: 天花板掉落,致四人受伤,真正的天降横祸
examples.translation: Ceiling fell injuring four, truly a disaster from the sky
